name: Flirty Flower
description:
These cotton fabric flowers are approximately 3" in diameter and can be made with a pin or alligator hair clip attached to the back.  They are the perfect complement to any outfit.  Pin it to your hat, bag, coat, sweater, belt or shirt, or tuck one into your hair to dress up a ponytail or updo.  

Flirty Flowers come in a variety of colors, with more coming soon!

Currently available: Ivory, Peacock, Russet, Curry

Coming soon: Dove, Plum, Cinnamon
